summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from November 2020 regarding a request for assistance from Squad C-20 for the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation. The emails discuss finding two volunteer agents to show digital discovery evidence to Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) on November 6, 2020.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; digital evidence is to be shown to her and her defense team at MDC.

events.title: Scheduled Discovery Review at MDC
events.description: Planned for two FBI agents to show digital discovery evidence to Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center from 8:00 am to 3:00 pm.

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20 was actively investigating Ghislaine Maxwell as of November 2020.
The investigation involved digital evidence that required presentation to the defense team.
The FBI was seeking two volunteer agents to assist with this discovery presentation on a specific date.
The correspondence indicates ongoing pre-trial preparation in the Maxwell case.
